backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the backend for a workout tracking app, with per-user data stores for exercise templates and workout sessions, and CRUD operations for both.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the useQueries.ts history hook fix to test REQ-3, confirming high confidence that the hook correctly calls the backend and maps responses for WorkoutHistory and HistorySessionCard.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, serving as a reference for build planning and component responsibilities across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module for the Track-A-Swole application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes including login, exercise library, session creation, active workout, history, and session detail pages.
Form component for adding a new exercise template with name, three default sets (weight/reps), and comments, using the useAddExercise mutation hook with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/CompletedExercis: Read-only card component that displays a completed workout exercise with a set-by-set table of weight and reps, plus an optional comments section.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseListItem: List item component for an exercise template that supports inline editing of name and sets, and deletion with a confirmation dialog, using edit/delete mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ExercisePicker.t: A dropdown + button component that lets users select an exercise from their library and add it to a session, resetting the selection after each add.
A collapsible card component for tracking sets (weight/reps) and comments for a single exercise during a workout session, with a visual indicator when data has been entered.
frontend/src/components/HistorySessionCa: A card component displaying a past workout session's name, date, and exercise count, navigating to the session detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app layout component providing a sticky header, bottom navigation bar, and authentication guard that redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/SessionExerciseL: A list component showing selected exercises for a session with up/down reorder buttons and a remove button for each exercise.
frontend/src/components/SetInputRow.tsx: A single row input component for entering weight and reps for one set, labeled with the set number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on exercises and workout sessions, including fetching, adding, editing, deleting exercises, and creating/completing workout sessions via a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActiveWorkout.tsx: Page component for an active workout session that restores/persists exercise data via localStorage, tracks sets per exercise, and submits the completed session to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CreateSession.tsx: Page component for creating a new workout session, allowing the user to name the session, pick exercises from their library, reorder them, and navigate to the active workout page.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseLibrary.tsx: Page component that displays the user's exercise templates in a list and provides a dialog for adding new exercise templates.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page component that presents navigation cards linking to the Exercise Library, Create Session, Workout History, and other app sections.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component that uses Internet Identity for authentication, redirecting to the home route on successful login. Displays a branded card UI with a sign-in button and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetail.tsx: Page that fetches and displays a single workout session by ID, showing its exercises via CompletedExerciseDisplay with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutHistory.tsx: Page that fetches and lists all past workout sessions using the useWorkoutHistory hook, rendering each via HistorySessionCard with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom oklch-based color tokens, border radius variables, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Track-A-Swole describing known issues (broken login persistence, empty history page, failed video upload) and pending fix requests for the workout history fetch and backend query logic.
